text:
Keyhole.co | Toronto | Full-time

Hi! I'm the marketing lead at Keyhole, the hashtag analytics company. We're a Toronto-based social media analytics company that builds real-time tracking products for a range of organizations. We're currently up to 16 people and continuing to grow. Data from our products have been featured in TIME, The Wall Street Journal, the Economist and more.

We are recruiting for a couple new roles:

- Full stack Developer (MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, JS/JQuery, CSS/SASS, PHP, UI Design) https://angel.co/keyhole-1/jobs/102632-full-stack-developer

- Customer Success https://angel.co/keyhole-1/jobs/135191-customer-success-repr...
